name: Word Game (itch) (ElzemGames)
description:
Looking for a new word game?

here it is!

Improve yourself with different questions from each category. Become a word master with over 100 questions! Every 5 levels you pass you get a new background skin and you can use it while playing.

With its simple and useful interface, you will never be confused. See the question and create the answer with the keys, if you can't find it, mix the letters. When you need help, you can click the light bulb button to get a hint.

While playing, increase your guessing power with different questions!
